titleStmt.title: A faithful narrative of the life and death of that holy and laborious preacher Mr. John Machin late of Astbury in the county of Chester. With a præfatory epistle thereunto; written by that excellent person Sir Charles Wolseley Baronet. Published for the furtherance of real piety in ministers and others.
titleStmt.author: Newcome, Henry, 1627-1695.

titleStmt.title: A faithful narrative of the life and death of that holy and laborious preacher Mr. John Machin late of Astbury in the county of Chester. With a præfatory epistle thereunto; written by that excellent person Sir Charles Wolseley Baronet. Published for the furtherance of real piety in ministers and others.
titleStmt.author: Newcome, Henry, 1627-1695.
Wolseley, Charles, Sir, 1630?-1714.

publicationStmt.publisher: prinred [sic] for Nevill Simmons at the three Crowns in Holbourn Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The life and death of Mr. John Machin.
Incorrectly identified on reel 1954 as Wing (2nd ed.) L2033.
Reproductions of the originals in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library ("Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 1467) and Dr. Williams's Library (reel 1954).
